targets.query: from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "automation") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> count() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 95.0})) |> yield(name: "Success Rate %")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "automation") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> yield(name: "Hourly Executions")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "service") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> group(columns: ["service"]) |> count() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 20) |> yield(name: "Service Usage")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "automation") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "trigger_type") |> group(columns: ["_value"]) |> count() |> yield(name: "Trigger Types")
